text: was a Japanese football player. He played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== In May 1925, when Shimizu was a Kwansei Gakuin University student, he was selected the Japan national team for Far Eastern Championship Games in Manila. At this competition, on May 20, he debuted against Republic of China. But Japan lost in this match (0-2). ==Statistics== Japan National Football Team Database |- |1925||1||0 |- !Total||1||0 |} ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing Category:Japanese footballers Category:Japan international footballers
title: Kinjiro Shimizu
